text: A'nanemo'za mofavre naga zamigura tusi zamasunku huzmante'naze. Hianagi ana mofavre naga'ma frizage'za, ana a'nanemo'za zamagra'a ana mofavrezmia kre'za ne'naze. E'inahu zama fore'ma hu'neana, ha' vahe'mo'zama nagri vahe'ma ha'ma eme huzmante'za zamazeri havizama hu'naza knafi anazana fore hu'ne.
